426:1: iti hi bhikṣavaḥ saṃvṛddhe kumāre rājā śuddhodano'pareṇa samayena śākyagaṇena sārdhaṃ saṃsthāgāre niṣaṇṇo'bhūt|
426:2: tatra te mahallakamahallakāḥ śākyā rājānaṃ śuddhodanamevamāhuḥ-yatkhalu devo jānīyāt|
426:3: ayaṃ sarvārthasiddhakumāro naimittikairbrāhmaṇaiḥ kṛtaniścayaiśca devairyadbhūyasaivaṃ nirdiṣṭo yadi kumāro'bhiniṣkramiṣyati,
426:5: uta nābhiniṣkramiṣyati rājā bhaviṣyati cakravartī caturaṅgo vijitavān dhārmiko dharmarājaḥ saptaratnasamanvāgataḥ|
426:7: tadyathā-cakraratnaṃ hastiratnaṃ aśvaratnaṃ maṇiratnaṃ strīratnaṃ gṛhapatiratnaṃ pariṇāyakaratnam|
426:9: saṃpūrṇaṃ cāsya putrasahasraṃ bhaviṣyati śūrāṇāṃ varāṅgarūpiṇāṃ parasainyapramardakānām|
426:16: tato rājā śuddhodana evamāha-yadyevaṃ tena hi vyavalokayata kamatā kanyā kumārasyānurūpā syāt|
426:18: ekaika evamāha-mama duhitā anurūpā syāt kumārasya|
426:23: tataśca te sarve saṃnipatya kumārasyaināṃ prakṛtimārocayanti sma|
426:24: tān kumāra uvāca-saptame divase prativacanaṃ śroṣyatheti||
426:34: sa punarapi mīmāṃsopāyakauśalyamāmukhīkṛtya sattvaparipākamavekṣamāṇo mahākarūṇāṃ saṃjanayya tasyāṃ velāyāmimāṃ gāthāmabhāṣata—
426:41: na ca rāgarakta na ca dhyānasukhebhi bhraṣṭāḥ
426:43: na ca prākṛtā mama vadhū anukūla yā syād
426:44: yasyā na iṣyatu guṇā sada satyavākyam|
426:48: yā kanya īdṛśa bhave mama tāṃ varethā|
426:50: yasyā guṇā kathayamī mama tāṃ varethā||6||
426:52: mātā svasā va yatha vartati maitracittā|
426:54: tāṃ tādṛśāṃ mama vadhūṃ varayasva tāta||7||
426:55: yasyā na mānu na khilo na ca doṣamasti
426:56: na ca śāṭhya īrṣya na ca māya na ujjubhraṣṭā|
426:59: na ca garvitā na pi ca uddhata na pragalbhā
426:61: na ca pānagṛddha na raseṣu na śabdagandhe
426:63: satye sthitā na pi ca cañcala naiva bhrāntā
426:67: na ca styānamiddhabahulā na ca mānamūḍhā
426:69: śvaśrau ca tasya śvaśure yatha śāstṛpremā
426:75: atha khalu bhikṣavo rājā śuddhodana imā gāthā vācayitvā purohitamāmantrayate sma-gaccha tvaṃ mahābrāhmaṇa kapilavastumahānagare|
426:77: yasyā ete guṇāḥ saṃvidyante kṣatriyakanyāyā vā brāhmaṇakanyāyā vā vaiśyakanyāyā vā śūdrakanyāyā vā tāṃ kanyāmasmākaṃ prativedaya|
426:79: na hi kumāraḥ kulārthiko na gotrārthikaḥ|
426:82: brāhmaṇīṃ kṣatriyāṃ kanyāṃ veśyāṃ śūdrīṃ tathaiva ca|
426:83: yasyā ete guṇāḥ santi tāṃ me kanyāṃ pravedaya||13||
426:84: na kulena na gotreṇa kumāro mama vismitaḥ|
426:85: guṇe satye ca dharme ca tatrāsya ramate manaḥ||14||iti||
426:86: atha khalu bhikṣavaḥ sa purohitastaṃ gāthālekhaṃ gṛhītvā kapilavastuni mahānagare gṛhādgṛhaṃ vyavalokayan gatvā hiṇḍan kanyāṃ paryeṣate sma|
426:88: so'nupūrveṇa vicaran yena daṇḍapāṇeḥ śākyasya niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāmat|
426:89: sa taṃ niveśanaṃ praviṣṭo'drākṣīt kanyāmabhirūpāṃ prāsādikāṃ darśanīyāṃ paramayā śubhavarṇapuṣkaratayā samanvāgatāṃ nātidīrghāṃ nātihrasvāṃ nātisthūlāṃ nātikṛśāṃ nātigaurāṃ nātikṛṣṇāṃ prathamayauvanāvasthāṃ strīratnamiva khyāyamānām|
426:90: atha sā dārikā purohitasya caraṇau gṛhītvā evamāha-kena te mahābrāhmaṇa kāryam?
426:95: yasyā guṇāsti hi ime sa hi tasya patnī||15||
426:97: atha sā dārikā taṃ gāthālekhaṃ vācayitvā smitamupadarśya taṃ purohitaṃ gāthayādhyabhāṣat—
426:100: bhaṇahi kumāru yadi kārya ma hū vilamba
426:102: atha sa khalu purohito rājānaṃ śuddhodanamupasaṃkramyaiva tamarthamārocayati sma-dṛṣṭā mayā deva kanyā yā kumārasyānurūpā syāt|
426:111: atha khalu rājā śuddhodano'śokabhāṇḍāni kārayati sma suvarṇamayāni rūpyamayāni nānāratnamayāni|
426:112: kārayitvā ca kapilavastuni mahānagare ghaṇṭāghoṣaṇāṃ kārayāmāsa-saptame divase kumāro darśanaṃ dāsyati,
426:115: iti hi bhikṣavaḥ saptame divase bodhisattvaḥ saṃsthāgāramupasaṃkramya bhadrāsane nyaṣīdat|
426:116: rājāpi śuddhodano'dṛśyapuruṣān sthāpayati sma-yasyāṃ dārikāyāṃ kumārasya cakṣuḥ saṃniviśet,
426:118: iti hi bhikṣavo yāvantyaḥ kapilavastuni mahānagare dārikāstāḥ sarvā yena saṃsthāgāro yena ca bodhisattvastenopasaṃkrāman bodhisattvasya darśanāya aśokabhāṇḍakāni ca pratigṛhītum||
426:119: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvo yathāgatābhyastābhyo dārikābhyo'śokabhāṇḍakānyanuprayacchati sma|
426:120: tāśca dārikā na śaknuvanti sma bodhisattvasya śriyaṃ tejaśca soḍhum|
426:121: tā aśokabhāṇḍakāni gṛhītvā śīghraṃ śīghrameva prakrāmanti sma||
426:122: atha daṇḍapāṇeḥ śākyasya duhitā gopā nāma śākyakanyā,
426:123: sā dāsīgaṇaparivṛtā puraskṛtā yena saṃsthāgāro yena ca bodhisattvastenopasaṃkrāmat|
426:126: tadā sā bodhisattvamupasaṃkramya prahasitavadanā bodhisattvamevamāha-kumāra kiṃ te mayāpanītaṃ yastvaṃ māṃ vimānayasi?
426:135: tatastairguhyapuruṣai rājānaṃ śuddhodanamupasaṃkramyaiṣa vṛttānto nivedito'bhūt-deva daṇḍapāṇeḥ śākyasya duhitā gopā nāma śākyakanyā,
426:138: ityetatkhalu vacanaṃ śrutvā rājā śuddhodano daṇḍapāṇeḥ śākyasya purohitaṃ dautyena preṣayati sma-yā te duhitā,
426:141: asmākaṃ cāyaṃ kuladharmaḥ śilpajñasya kanyā dātavyā nāśilpajñasyeti|
426:146: yadāpi mayoktaṃ kasmācchākyakumārāḥ kumārasyopasthānāya nāgacchantīti tadāpyahamabhihitaḥ-kiṃ vayaṃ maṇḍakasyopasthānaṃ kariṣyāma iti|
426:153: yāvattrirapi bodhisattvo rājānaṃ śuddhodanaṃ paripṛcchati sma||
426:154: tato rājā śuddhodano bodhisattvāya tāṃ prakṛtimārocayati sma|
426:155: tāṃ śrutvā bodhisattva āha-deva asti punariha nagare kaścidyo mayā sārdhaṃ samarthaḥ śilpena śilapamupadarśayitum?
426:156: tato rājā śuddhodanaḥ prahasitavadano bodhisattvamevamāha-śakyasi punastvaṃ putra śilpamupadarśayitum?
426:160: tato rājā śuddhodanaḥ kapilavastuni mahānagaravare ghaṇṭāghoṣaṇāṃ kārayati sma-saptame divase kumāraḥ svaṃ śilpamupadarśayati|
426:162: tatra saptame divase pañcamātrāṇi śākyakumāraśatāni saṃnipatitānyabhūvan|
426:163: daṇḍapāṇeśca śākyasya duhitā gopā nāma śākyakanyā jayapatākā sthāpitābhūt-yo vā atra asidhanuṣkalāpayuddhasālambheṣu jeṣyati,
426:165: tatra sarvapurato devadattaḥ kumāro nagarādabhiniṣkrāmati sma|
426:166: śvetaśca hastī mahāpramāṇo bodhisattvasyārthe nagaraṃ praveśyate sma|
426:167: tatra devadattaḥ kumāra īrṣyayā ca śākyabalamadena ca mattaḥ|
426:168: sa taṃ hastināgaṃ vāmena pāṇinā śuṇḍāyāṃ gṛhītvā dakṣiṇena pāṇinā capeṭayā ekaprahāreṇaiva hato'bhūt||
426:174: sa taṃ hastināgaṃ lāṅgūle gṛhītvā nagaradvārādapakarṣati sma||
426:185: tataḥ kumāro rathasya evaikaṃ pādaṃ bhūmau prasārya pādāṅguṣṭhena taṃ hastināgaṃ lāṅgūle gṛhitvā sapta prākārān sapta ca parikhānatikramya bahirnagarasya krośamātre prakṣipati sma|
426:186: yatra va pradeśe sa hastī patitastasmin pradeśe mahadbilaṃ saṃvṛttaṃ yatsāṃprataṃ hastigartetyabhidhīyate||
426:191: sapta purāparikhā atikramya kṣiptu bahiḥ svapurātu ayaṃ hi||17||
426:194: iti hi pañcamātrāṇi śākyakumāraśatāni nagarānniṣkamya yenānyatamaḥ pṛthivīpradeśo yatra śākyakumārāḥ śilpamupadarśayanti sma tenopasaṃkrāman|
426:195: rājāpi śuddhodano mahallakamahallakāśca śākyā mahāṃśca janakāyo yenāsau pṛthivīpradeśastenopasaṃkrāman bodhisattvasya cānyeṣāṃ ca śākyakumārāṇāṃ śilpaviśeṣaṃ draṣṭukāmāḥ||
426:196: tatra ādita eva ye śākyakumārā lipyāṃ paṭuvidhijñāste bodhisattvena sārdhaṃ lipiṃ viśeṣayanti sma|
426:197: tatra taiḥ śākyairviśvāmitra ācāryaḥ sākṣī sthāpito'bhūt-sa tvaṃ vyavalokaya katamo'tra kumāro lipijñāne viśiṣyate yadi vā lekhyato yadi vā bahulipiniryāṇataḥ|
426:198: atha viśvāmitra ācāryaḥ pratyakṣo bodhisattvasya lipijñāne smitamupadarśayannime gāthe'bhāṣata—
426:200: yāvanti kecillipi sarvaloke tatraiṣa pāraṃgatu śuddhasattvaḥ||19||
426:201: nāmāpi yūyaṃ ca ahaṃ ca teṣāṃ lipīna jānāma na cākṣarāṇām|
426:202: yānyeṣa jānāti manuṣyacandro ahamatra pratyakṣu vijeṣyate'yam||20||
426:205: tatrārjuno nāma śākyagaṇako mahāmātraḥ saṃkhyāgaṇanāsu pāraṃgataḥ,
426:206: sa sākṣī sthāpito'bhūt-sa tvaṃ vyavalokaya katamo'tra kumāro viśiṣyate saṃkhyājñānata iti|
426:210: bodhisattvasyaika dvau trayaścatvāraḥ pañcadaśa viṃśattriṃśaccatvāriṃśatpañcāśacchataṃ yāvatpañcāpi śākyakumāraśatāni yugapatkāle nikṣipanti sma,
426:216: dvāvapi trayo'pi pañcāpi daśāpi viṃśatyapi triṃśadapi catvāriṃśadapi pañcāśadapi yāvatpañcāpi śākyakumāraśatāni yugapaduddiśanti sma|
426:217: na ca pariprāpayanti sma bodhisattvasya nikṣipataḥ||
426:228: īdṛśī ca iyaṃ prajñā buddhirjñānaṃ smṛtirmatiḥ|
426:231: ekakaṇṭhāścemāṃ vācamabhāṣanta-jayati jayati bhoḥ sarvārthasiddhaḥ kumāraḥ|
426:232: sarve cāsanebhya utthāya kṛtāñjalipuṭā bhūtvā bodhisattvaṃ namaskṛtya rājānaṃ śuddhodanametadavocan-lābhāste mahārāja paramasulabdhāḥ,
426:233: yasya te putra evaṃ śīghralaghujavacapalaparipṛcchāpratibhāna iti||
426:234: atha sa rājā śuddhodano bodhisattvamevamāha-śakyasi putra arjunena gaṇakamahāmātreṇa sārdhaṃ saṃkhyājñānakauśalyagaṇanāgatimanupraveṣṭum?
426:236: athārjuno gaṇakamahāmātro bodhisattvamevamāha-jānīṣe tvaṃ kumāra koṭiśatottarāṃ nāma gaṇanāgatim?
426:263: iti hi tallakṣaṇagaṇanayā sumerūparvatarājo lakṣanikṣepakriyayā parikṣayaṃ gacchet|
426:265: yasyāṃ gaṇanāyāṃ gaṅgānadīvālikāsamā lakṣanikṣepakriyayā parikṣayaṃ gaccheyuḥ|
426:272: yasyāṃ gaṇanāyāṃ daśa gaṅgānadīvālikāsamā lakṣanikṣepakriyayā parikṣayaṃ gaccheyuḥ|
426:274: yatra koṭīśataṃ gaṅgānadīvālikāsamā lakṣanikṣepāḥ parikṣayaṃ gaccheyuḥ|
426:276: yatra tathāgataṃ sthāpayitvā bodhimaṇḍavarāgragataṃ ca sarvaṃdharmābhiṣekābhimukhaṃ bodhisattvaṃ nānyaḥ kaścitsattvaḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyate ya etāṃ gaṇanāṃ prajānāti anyatrāhaṃ vā yo vā syānmādṛśaḥ|
426:298: nirdiśatu kumāro yojanapiṇḍaṃ kiyanti tāni paramāṇurajāṃsi bhavantīti|
426:299: bodhisattvo'vocat-tatra yojanapiṇḍaḥ paramāṇurajasāṃ paripūrṇamakṣobhyanayutamekaṃ triṃśacca koṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi ṣaṣṭiśca koṭīśatāni dvātriṃśatiśca koṭyaḥ pañca ca daśaśatasahasrāṇi dvādaśa ca sahasrāṇi etāvān yojanapiṇḍaḥ paramāṇurajonikṣepasya|
426:304: anena praveśenemaṃ cāturdvīpakaṃ lokadhātūṃ pramukhaṃ kṛtvā paripūrṇakoṭīśataṃ cāturdvīpakānāṃ lokadhātūnāṃ yatra koṭīśataṃ mahāsamudrāṇām,
426:340: asmin khalu punargaṇanāparivarte bodhisattvena nirdiśyamāne arjuno gaṇakamahāmātraḥ sarvaśca śākyagaṇastuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramudita āścaryādbhutaprāpto'bhūt|
426:349: trisāhasri rajāśrayantakā tṛṇavana oṣadhiyo jalasya bindūn|
426:350: huṃkāreṇa nyaseya ekinaiṣo ko puni vismayu pañcabhiḥ śatebhiḥ||24||
426:357: iti hi bhikṣavo'bhibhūtāḥ sarve śākyakumārā abhūvan|
426:359: tadanantaraṃ laṅghite plavite javite sarvatra bodhisattva eva viśiṣyate sma|
426:362: atha kṛtulaghukāyacittanetā tasya javasya viśeṣatāṃ śṛṇotha||26||
426:364: api ca daśasu dikṣū gacchate'yaṃ kṣaṇena|
426:367: na ca puna gati āgatiṃ ca asyā yūyaṃ prajānatha tāvadṛddhiprāpto|
426:368: ko'tra javiti vismayo janeyā asadṛśa eṣa karotha gauravo'smin||28||
426:369: evaṃ kṛtvā bodhisattva eva viśiṣyate sma||
426:370: tatra śākyā āhuḥ— yuddheṣu tāvatkumāro viśeṣayitavyo jijñāsyaśca|
426:372: tāni ca pañcamātrāṇi śākyakumāraśatāni yugapadyudhyanti sma||
426:376: tau bodhisattvasya balaṃ tejaścāsahamānau dharaṇītale prapatitāvabhūtām|
426:377: tadanantaraṃ devadattaḥ kumāro garvitaśca mānī ca balavāneva tabdhaḥ śākyamānena ca tabdho bodhisattvena sārdhaṃ vispardhamānaḥ sarvāvantaṃ raṅgamaṇḍalaṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya vikrīḍamāno bodhisattvamabhipatati sma|
426:378: atha bodhisattvo'saṃbhrānta evātvaran dakṣiṇena pāṇinā salīlaṃ devadattaṃ kumāraṃ gṛhītvā trirgaganatale parivartya mānanigrahārthamavihiṃsābuddhyā maitreṇa cittena dharaṇītale nikṣipati sma|
426:382: atha te sarve harṣitā bhūtvā bodhisattvamabhinipatitāḥ|
426:383: te samanantaraspṛṣṭā bodhisattvena bodhisattvasya śriyaṃ tejaśca kāyabalaṃ sthāmaṃ cāsahamānāḥ spṛṣṭamātrā eva bodhisattvena dharaṇitale prāpatan|
426:398: evaṃ kṛtvā bodhisattva eva viśiṣyate sma||
426:401: tatra ānandasya dvayoḥ krośayorayasmayī bherī lakṣaṃ sthāpitābhūt|
426:402: asyānantaraṃ devadattasya caturṣu krośeṣvayasmayī bherī sthāpitābhūt|
426:405: tasyānantaraṃ sapta tālā ayasmayī varāhapratimā yantrayuktā sthāpitābhūt|
426:416: tato bodhisattva āha-astīha deva nagare kiṃcidanyaddhanuryanmamāropaṇaṃ saheta kāyabalasthāmaṃ ca?
426:419: rājā āha- tava putra pitāmahaḥ siṃhahanurnāmābhūt,
426:421: na punastatkaścicchaknoti sma taddhanurāropayituṃ prāgeva pūrayitum|
426:425: tatra sarve śākyakumārāḥ parameṇāpi prayatnena vyāyacchamānā na śaknuvanti sma taddhanurāropayituṃ prāgeva pūravitum|
426:427: atha daṇḍapāṇiḥ śākyaḥ sarvaṃ kāyabalasthāma saṃjanayya taddhanurāropayitumārabdho'bhūt|
426:430: tadbodhisattvo gṛhītvā āsanādanuttiṣṭhannevārdhaparyaṅkaṃ kṛtvā vāmena pāṇinā(gṛhītvā)
426:432: tasya dhanuṣa āropyamāṇasya sarvaṃ kapilavastu mahānagaraṃ śabdenābhivijñaptamabhūt|
426:437: gaganatalagatāśca devaputrā rājānaṃ śuddhodanaṃ taṃ ca mahāntaṃ janakāyaṃ gāthayādhyabhāṣanta—
426:439: na ca utthitu āsani no ca bhūmī|
426:442: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvastaddhanuḥ pūrayitveṣuṃ gṛhītvā tādṛśena balasthāmnā tamiṣuṃ kṣipati sma,
426:443: yena yā cānandasya bherī yā ca devadattasya yāvatsunddaranandasya yāvaddaṇḍapāṇetāḥ sarvā abhinirbhidya tāṃ ca daśakrośasthāṃ svakāmayasmayīṃ bherīṃ saptatālāṃ yantrayuktavarāhapratimāmabhinirbhidya sa iṣurdharaṇītalaṃ praviśya adarśanābhāso'bhūt|
426:444: yatra ca pradeśe sa iṣurbhūmitalaṃ bhittvā praviṣṭastasmin pradeśe kūpaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ,
426:448: na ca nāma anena yogyā kṛtā,
426:450: gaganatalagatāśca devaputrā rājānaṃ śuddhodanaṃ taṃ ca mahāntaṃ janakāyamevamāhuḥ-ko'tra vismayo manujāḥ| tatkasmāt?
426:455: evamuktvā te devaputrā bodhisattvaṃ divyaiḥ puṣpairabhyavakīrya prākrāman||
426:456: evaṃ laṅghite prāgvallipimudrāgaṇanāsaṃkhyasālambhadhanurvede javite plavite taraṇe iṣvastre hastigrīvāyāmaśvapṛṣṭhe rathe dhanuṣkalāpe sthairyasthāmni suśaurye bāhuvyāyāme aṅkuśagrahe pāśagrahe udyāne niryāṇe avayāne muṣṭibandhe padabandhe śikhābandhe chedye bhedye dālane sphālane akṣuṇṇavedhitve marmavedhitve śabdavedhitve dṛḍhaprahāritve akṣakrīḍāyāṃ kāvyakaraṇe granthe citre rūpe rūpakarmaṇi dhīte agnikarmaṇi vīṇāyāṃ vādye nṛtye gīte paṭhite ākhyāne hāsye lāsye nāṭye viḍambite mālyagrathane saṃvāhite maṇirāge vastrarāge māyākṛte svapnādhyāye śakunirute strīlakṣaṇe puruṣalakṣaṇe aśvalakṣaṇe hastilakṣaṇe golakṣaṇe ajalakṣaṇe miśralakṣaṇe kauṭubheśvaralakṣaṇe nirghaṇṭe nigame purāṇe itihāse vede vyākaraṇe nirukte śikṣāyāṃ chandasvinyāṃ yajñakalpe jyotiṣe sāṃkhye yoge kriyākalpe vaiśike vaiśeṣike arthavidyāyāṃ bārhaspatye āmbhirye āsurye mṛgapakṣirute hetuvidyāyāṃ jalayantre madhūcchiṣṭakṛte sūcikarmaṇi vidalakarmaṇi patrachede gandhayuktau-ityevamādyāsu sarvakarmakalāsu laukikādiṣu divyamānuṣyakātikrāntāsu sarvatra bodhisattva eva viśiṣyate sma||
426:457: atha khalu punastena samayena daṇḍapāṇiḥ śākyaḥ svāṃ duhitaraṃ gopāṃ śākyakanyāṃ bodhisattvāya prādāt|
426:458: sā ca rājñā śuddhodanenānupūrveṇa bodhisattvasya vṛtābhūt||
426:459: tatra khalvapi bodhisattvaścaturaśītistrīsahasrāṇāṃ madhye prāpto lokānubhavanatayā ramamāṇaṃ krīḍayantaṃ paricārayantamātmānamupadarśayati sma|
426:460: tāsāṃ caturaśīte strīsahasrāṇāṃ gopā śākyakanyā sarvāsāmagramahiṣyabhiṣiktābhūt||
426:461: tatra khalvapi gopā śākyakanyā na kaṃcid dṛṣṭvā vadanaṃ chādayati sma śvaśrūṃ vā śvaśuraṃ vāntarjanaṃ vā|
426:463: vicārayanti sma-navavadhūkā hi nāma pratilīnā tiṣṭhati,
426:465: tato gopā śākyakanyā etāṃ prakṛtiṃ śrutvā sarvasyāntarjanasya purataḥ sthitvā imā gāthā abhāṣata-
426:468: gacchan vai śobhate ārya āgacchannapi śobhate|
426:469: sthito vātha niṣaṇṇo vā āryaḥ sarvatra śobhate||35||
426:471: kalaviṅko yathā pakṣī darśanena svareṇa vā||36||
426:474: sarveṇa śobhate āryo yasya pāpaṃ na vidyate|
426:493: cittaṃ ca yeṣu vivṛtaṃ na hirī na lajjā|
426:494: na ca yeṣu īdṛśa guṇā napi satyavākyaṃ
426:505: aśroṣīdbhikṣavo rājā śuddhodano nāma gopāyāḥ śākyakanyāyā imāmevaṃrūpāṃ sarvāṃ gāthāṃ pratibhānanirdeśam|
426:506: śrutvā ca punastuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāto'nekaratnapratyuptena dūṣyayugena koṭīśatasahasramūlyena ca muktāhāreṇābhijātalohitamuktāpratyuptayā ca suvarṇamālayā gopāṃ śākyakanyāmabhicchādyainamudānamudānayati sma—
426:507: yathā ca putro mama bhūṣito guṇaiḥ
